pr_title: Convert Keyboard Input Map Code to Config

timeline.message:
Peripheral Input Mappings: convert code to config

Converting from code to coded config will later allow us to convert from
config to preferences. This is another layer of abstraction in order to
integrate a custom keymap with the Reviewer.

timeline.author: mikehardy

timeline.bodyText: should just chain this to the other constructor with null for unicodeCharacter argument?
timeline.author: mikehardy

replies.author: david-allison-1

replies.bodyText: Oh - missed the prior null yes - I see they're going different directions - no problem
replies.author: mikehardy
